snippet: With the founder of Best Buy announcing on Thursday that he was resigning and potentially selling off his 20.1 percent stake in the company, many have been wondering whether the beleaguered electronics retailer may be sold.
abstract: With the founder of Best Buy announcing on Thursday that he was resigning and potentially selling off his 20.1 percent stake in the company, many have been wondering whether the beleaguered electronics retailer may be sold.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: As Best Buy Founder Leaves, Thoughts of a Leveraged Buyout Re-emerge
